IDEAS.IS.summary: Idealist Danismanlik A.S. operates as a management consulting company in Turkey. The company provides consultancy services in the fields of organizational development and human resources. It also offers competency development, management development, leadership development, change and loyalty, sales management, and smart management development solutions. In addition, the company organizes summits on human resources and marketing activities. It serves the finance, pharmaceutical, fast moving consumer goods, telecommunications, and holding and other sectors. The company was formerly known as MCT Danismanlik A.S. Idealist Danismanlik A.S. was founded in 1992 and is based in Istanbul, Turkey.
